Make sure to order the Bayshore Gimlet, a refreshing cocktail that perfectly captures the essence of summer. For a savory snack, don't miss the Shrimp Cocktail – it's a classic choice and pairs well with any drink. Consider the spicy Margarita, which has received rave reviews for its fantastic balance of flavors, making it a perfect choice for a delightful evening. Opt for seating in the cozy couches for a more intimate experience, ideal for date nights or special gatherings. Click here to send a gift up to $1,000 with the suggestion to use it at EDGE Rooftop Cocktail Lounge. Is this your business? Claim your business to update business information, customize this listing, and more! Learn more about EDGE Rooftop Cocktail Lounge Price $$ Ambience Upscale Hours Wednesday-Thursday: 5PM-12AM Friday-Saturday: 5PM-1AM EDGE Rooftop Cocktail Lounge is an upscale destination in Tampa that combines stunning views with expertly crafted cocktails. Perched high above the city, this rooftop lounge provides a vibrant atmosphere ideal for unwinding with friends or enjoying a romantic evening. Guests can indulge in a selection of delicious appetizers that complement the drinks perfectly. The bar offers a varied cocktail menu, featuring unique concoctions like the Senorita and Bayshore Gimlet, both known for their distinctive flavors. The lounge's chic decor and comfortable seating create a relaxing ambiance, making it a favored spot for both locals and visitors alike. With stunning sunset views and a lively nightlife scene, EDGE Rooftop Cocktail Lounge is a must-visit for anyone seeking an unforgettable night out in Tampa. Great Alternatives Gift $100 for Jekyll : Jekyll at Hyde Park in Tampa is a captivating local hotspot, offering an exquisite dining experience that seamlessly blends innovative cuisine, a stylish atmosphere, and exceptional service. Buy a Gift & Greeting Card for Palihouse Lobby Bar - Hyde Park Village : Palihouse Lobby Bar - Hyde Park Village in Tampa offers a sophisticated and welcoming atmosphere to enjoy craft cocktails and small plates in style. Detailed Reviews: Reviews ordered by recency and descriptiveness of user-identified themes such as waiting time, length of visit, general tips, and location information. 4.1 4.1 of 5 bubbles ( 69 ) Excellent 32 Very good 21 Average 9 Poor 5 Terrible 2 Tampa2020 Tampa, FL 50 contributions 0 2 of 5 bubbles Rude bartenders Apr 2022 Management, please get new bartenders. This was the worst service I can remember. We were served (at the bar) by 2 different bartenders and they could not have acted more aloof and irritated if they tried. We were 2, quiet couples all around 60 ish at a table (as an aside if you have 3-4 staff behind the bar as we saw and only 10 or fewer customers, some table service would have been nice). Nevertheless approaching the bar, we were ignored, then finally asked what we wanted  - not by walking up to where we were standing but by shouting from the other end while leaning against the wall near the door to a back room. Best part is this happened again the second time we went up. Just rude. Read more Written April 18, 2022 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. TOURtheWORLDMexPal United States 4,558 contributions 0 3 of 5 bubbles Nothing special about the bar nor the view Jun 2021 Nothing special about the bar nor the view Service: non-existent May be it is a place just for very young folks and for large groups. Read more Written June 26, 2021 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. MzMima Lakeland, FL 1 contribution 0 3 of 5 bubbles It was ok....... Mar 2021 I went to this beautiful "The Edge" bar last night with some friends. The place was a beautiful setting. I did not know you cant have dinner on the roof top bar itself but you can have these small snack plates which they do offer on the roof top bar itself. They are a bit pricey for the portions they give you. The staff was excellent, polite and the drinks were great too but i feel it could have been better for a rooftop bar.  Music was ok...  You get there and have to wait for a bit to go upstairs because of the covid, they dont want to many ppl up there. You do have to pay for parking after 7pm.  It is a great place to have lunch but for my night time review of this place i want to give a 3 star. Read more Written March 28, 2021 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Renae U Cleveland, OH 6 contributions 0 5 of 5 bubbles Short stay Feb 2021 My husband and I stayed at the Edge hotel for a night.  The rooftop bar is where we spent most of the time due to the pool bar being closed during the week...that was a disappointment. But Dan the bartender who worked his tail off to please the customers had such a great attitude and made our stay better.  I'm not sure why he had no one to help him throughout the day and into happy hour but he handled it very well and kept a smile on his face the whole time.  I would return to the Roof top bar again  but not stay at the hotel. Read more Written February 15, 2021 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Teakwo23 Palm Harbor, FL 6,600 contributions 0 4 of 5 bubbles Veggie cocktails? Feb 2020 • Couples Cool atmosphere with outdoor patio area. Service was a bit slow. Weird drink menu with vegetable drinks on it. Old fashioned was good. Read more Written February 19, 2020 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Kevin Scott Hello there Teakwo23!
Thank you so much for joining us and taking a moment to share your thoughts and feedback around your experience. As Tampa's favorite food & wine hotel we wanted to provide a creative spin on a few culinary focused cocktails. They are light, refreshing and pair well with the amazing weather we've been having. At the same time we are known for our old fashioned and are so pleased to read you enjoyed it. 
Again, thank you for visiting and we hope to welcome you back soon!
Kind regards,
Kevin Scott
kscott@epicureanhotel.com Read more Written February 24, 2020 This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Anne F Palm Harbor, FL 4,767 contributions 0 4 of 5 bubbles S&P Feb 2020 • Couples Fun little rooftop bar in a pretty aNd modern South Tampa Hotel. Nice crowd and comfortable lounging. Drink menu was however odd with 1/2 the drinks containing either lettuce, peas, or salt and pepper?! However old fashioneds were good and loved the big clear rocks sphere and view in an area with lots to do. Read more Written February 17, 2020 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Kevin Scott Hello there Anne!
Thank you so much for joining us at EDGE and for taking a moment to share your experience. We loved having you and appreciate your kind words around our space, crowd and view. Please note that while many of the drinks you mentioned are changing we have no plans to take away the Old Fashioned! 
Again, thank you for joining us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. 
Kind regards,
Kevin Scott
kscott@epicureanhotel.com Read more Written February 19, 2020 This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Glenn C Madeira Beach, FL 129 contributions 1 3 of 5 bubbles Cool atmosphere but pricey drinks and rough service Dec 2019 Came here for a few drinks before heading over to Burns steakhouse. We ordered two top shelf Whiskeys on the rocks.  The bartender, "Nevena"  grabs the rocks glasses off the shelf by putting her fingers into the glass holding them from the top. No, No, No,  Never put your fingers inside a customers drink glass !!! Then using a shot jigger precisely measures up the line (1.5oz) not a drop more and while dumping the shot into the glass spills little over the side of the glass.  Geez, happened with both drinks.. I did really like the single big square Ice cubes for rocks drinks. Read more Written December 16, 2019 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Kevin Scott Hello there Glenn!
Thank you so much for joining us at EDGE and for taking a moment to share your thoughts from your recent experience this weekend. While we are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the atmosphere you are absolutely right about the behavior witnessed. It's not allowed for any service staff to put fingers in a guests glass. I'm terribly sorry that this happened and we'll be re-training the entire team on this standard. 
We'd love to welcome you back for a round of drinks of us given the experience you had. Please don't hesitate to reach out to me directly to set up. 
Again, thank you for joining us and we hope you have a wonderful holiday and amazing 2020!
Kind regards,
Kevin Scott
kscott@epicureanhotel.com Read more Written December 23, 2019 This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. NFulton 1 contribution 0 5 of 5 bubbles Drinks w/ my girls Jul 2019 • Friends We had a women empowerment meet up here and I was simply blow away by the friendly staff and the amazing drinks. I would definitely be going back and happy with my entire service here! Read more Written August 23, 2019 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Kevin Scott Hello there NFulton5!
First, thank you for joining us for the women empowerment event. We were grateful to play a small role in the event and are thrilled to hear how great of a time you had with us. Our team takes immense pride in providing our guests with delicious food and beverage offerings and personalized service. 
Again, we are so happy to have you join us and cannot to welcome you back. 
Kind regards,
Kevin Scott
kscott@epicureanhotel.com Read more Written August 28, 2019 This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC. airie2011 Tampa, FL 955 contributions 0 5 of 5 bubbles Nice Rooftop with Unique Drinks May 2019 • Couples Love the renovated rooftop bar. We enjoy coming here for craft cocktails after dinner downstairs. I was very impressed with a drink I had last time we visited that was supposed to taste like a salad. It was very refreshing and interesting and unique. This is why I will continue to come here. The view is nice, its not amazing, but you can see downtown off in the distance. Its kind of a small space, but its not too crowded. It wasn't super  busy any of the times we visited. Read more Written July 18, 2019 This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more. Kevin Scott Hello there airie2011!
Thank you so much for joining us and for taking a moment to share your thoughts and feedback around the recent enhancements we've made to EDGE. After listening to our guests for the past year we decided it was time to give EDGE it's own roof. Love that you enjoyed the Ahead of Lettuce cocktail as well! So tasty and refreshing. 
Again, thank you for joining us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. 
Kind regards,
Kevin Scott
